nl.esciencecenter.esight.math

Class MatF2

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.math.MatrixF
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.math.MatF2

  • public class MatF2
extends MatrixF
    2x2 float matrix implementation.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE
      The number of elements in this matrix

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatF2()
      Creates a new identity matrix.
      MatF2(float in)
      Creates a new matrix with all slots filled with the parameter.
      MatF2(float m00, float m01, float m10, float m11)
      Creates a new matrix using the parameters row-wise as filling.
      MatF2(MatF2 n)
      Creates a new matrix by copying the matrix used as parameter.
      MatF2(VecF2 v0, VecF2 v1)
      Creates a new matrix, using the vectors in order as filling.

      • MatF2

        public MatF2(float m00,
     float m01,
     float m10,
     float m11)
        Creates a new matrix using the parameters row-wise as filling.
        Parameters:
        m00 - The parameter on position 0x0.
        m01 - The parameter on position 0x1.
        m10 - The parameter on position 1x0.
        m11 - The parameter on position 1x1.

      • MatF2

        Creates a new matrix by copying the matrix used as parameter.
        Parameters:
        n - The old matrix to be copied.
